sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"勇气，胆量"之意。
means: courage ： 普通用词。指面对危险或困难时无所畏惧的精神和敢于奋斗的进取心。
bravery ： 指在危险中表现出的无所畏惧精神或在逆境中仍能坚持下去的毅力。
backbone ： 指性格倔强，意志坚定，有骨气，有顽强的决心去做某事。
nerve ： 侧重指面临危险或在冒险的情况下具有冷静、清醒的头脑和坚定无畏的勇气。

sentence.Network_en: They had faced one difficulty after another with bravery and dedication.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们以无畏和无私奉献的精神迎接了一个又一个的困难。

sentence.Network_en: She presented a bravery award to schoolgirl Caroline Tucker.
sentence.Network_cn: 她向女学生卡罗琳·塔克颁发了英勇奖状。

sentence.Network_en: He was decorated for bravery in battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因为作战英勇而被授予奖章。

普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... brave 勇敢 bravery 英勇 breadth 阔度.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... doggery 狗性，卑鄙行为 bravery 勇敢，大胆 bribery 贿赂.

...C电视台选为2005年最有前(钱)途的“勇者无畏”乐队（The bravery）(The Bravery)，在唱片公司Island的安排下，乐队（The bravery）的首张同名唱片在2005年3月14 …
欧美歌手 - YYMP3.COM ... Thalia[ 塔莉亚] The Bravery[ 大无畏乐团] The Calling[ 呼叫乐团].
Kate showed great bravery when she tried to stop the man stabbing the women ., 当凯特试图阻止歹徒刺伤那位妇女时 , 她显示出了巨大的勇气.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'bravado'): from French braverie or Italian braveria 'boldness', based on Latin barbarus (see barbarous)

entry.def: Bravery is brave behaviour or the quality of being brave.

example.ex: He deserves the highest praise for his bravery.
example.tran: 他的英勇行为应该获得最高的赞誉。

means.word_mean: 1. a quality of spirit that enables you to face danger of pain without showing fear

auth_sentence.content: She acquires the bravery to sacrifice herself for others.
auth_sentence.res_content: She acquires the bravery to sacrifice herself for others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She acquires the bravery to sacrifice herself for others.

auth_sentence.content: He has some bravery and he has a defence now.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has some bravery and he has a defence now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has some bravery and he has a defence now.

auth_sentence.content: During the Games we've seen great bravery in performance.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
nurse养育,护理+ery场所,地点→nursery托儿所

sentences.en: The judge praised the firefighters for their bravery and devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 法官赞扬消防人员的勇气和敬业精神。

sentences.en: These soldiers were decorated for bravery.
sentences.cn: 这些士兵因英勇而受奖。
